title: Ocenia Pbe?
body:
Hi there, a lot of people have been wanting a Ocenia PBE testing server
I hope that this idea may can to the riot games.
Hope this has gave you a idea for testing with Ocenia
Regards, DatPicture {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
I'd like to be able to register for PBE using my oce account.
It'd be a bonus to have a PBE server in OCE but that'll never happend. So just let us sign up for PBE using our OCE accounts at least!!!

Right now the Oceanic server has hardly enough people to sustain the already limited queues (lack of draft normal queue) on the server. Adding a PBE to the Oceanic server would just add to the strain on queues. That said, you can still access the NA PBE.
